    Calculates distance walked in kilometers Updates distanceWalked property
    CALORIES_PER_STEP - Static variable in class FitnessTracker
    Conversion factor: cals per step
    checkGoal() - Method in class FitnessTracker
    Checks if a user's daily step goal has been met Prints a congratulatory message if the current steps walked are greater than the goal.

    F

    FitnessTracker - Class in Unnamed Package
    FitnessTracker.java Author: Chris Silva Class: COP-2800 Assignment: Module 4 - Fitness Tracker Description: This program represents a Fitness tracker which monitors steps, distance walked, calories burned and heart rate.
    FitnessTracker() - Constructor for class FitnessTracker
    Explicit default constructor that sets all values within FitnessTracker to zero Initializes name as an empty string and all numeric fields to zero

    Parameterized constructor that accepts values for all fields Initializes values for all parameters
